attributes.action: Create a day to celebrate British history and British culture
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A petition to the PM to create a day to celebrate British culture and British history. A good example of this would be the British Empire, revive Empire Day with its slogan: Remember, Remember Empire Day, the 24th of May.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
